content:
@Kenny Lau Is there a bigger plan behind this PR? How will this tie in to more general approaches to algebraic topology, higher homotopy groups, (co)homology, etc...
Do you need this soonish for some other thing?
can't homotopy groups be interpreted as some infinity category thing related to the fundamental groupoid?
@Kenny Lau This is certainly fundamental... but it might still be a side effect of other fundamental things (-;
